textBox.richText: Mom had a race in Vegas, so Max and I headed up to the mountain house. WP had opened on wednesday with parkway and porcupine...Max and I decided to check the snow report first thing in the morning to decide where to go. Loveland has Drifter and Firecut under chair 2...they got 2” of snow. Copper opened up the flyer on friday...they had 5” of new snow. Bad news for both: cold and windy, so we decided to just hit the local mountain. Not the most challenging terrain, but at least we had fun...and I spotted these two:
